entities.name: barty
entities.description: Barty is mentioned as someone who received a nasty little shock. He is described as old and should have spent more time with his family.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is the one who found out information about Barty's son. He was in Azkaban when Barty's son was brought in.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry asks Sirius if Barty's son was a Death Eater.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione whispers to Harry about Crouch trying to get his son off.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as someone who tried to protect his reputation by letting his son off.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people that Barty's son was caught with.
